metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2816 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Consul and Consul Enterprise allowed any user with service:writepermissions to use Envoy extensions configured via service-defaults topatch remote proxy instances that target the configured service, regardlessof whether the user has permission to modify the service(s) correspondingto those modified proxies.

criterions.comment: consul package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
